content: MT-BR-40D O4 OC Bracket Medium-duty C-Channel double-bracket with 4-hole baseplate for outdoor applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Economical – high load/weight ratio and rapid assembly make MT strut channel a more efficient alternative to welded MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Four anchorage holes for enhanced resistance against lateral forces Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Applications Supporting pipe rings, ventilation ducts, cable trays and other MEP support hardware Mounting medium-duty MEP installations on concrete Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Hot-dip galvanized - for outdoor use Material thickness: 8 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2271459 - Bracket MT-BR-40D O4 600 OC - Package Size 4 pc - 2271461 - Bracket MT-BR-40D O4 1000 OC - Package Size 4 pc - 2271287 - Bracket MT-BR-40D O4 1500 OC - Package Size 2 pc
